name: Kunwu's Iris Rift

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 10%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 24%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 12%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 30%.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 14%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 36%.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 16%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 42%.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 18%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 48%.

description: A polearm made from a meteorite, capable of cutting rainbows in a flash. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.
